titles.title: Lord Jesus! when we think of Thee

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Lord Jesus! when we think of Thee, Of all Thy love and grace, Our spirits long and fain would see Thy beauty face to face.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: And though the wilderness we tread, A barren, thirsty ground, With thorns and briars overspread, Where foes and snares abound;

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Yet in Thy love such depths we see, Our hearts o’erflow with praise— Content ourselves, while, Lord to Thee A joyful song we raise.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Our Lord, our Life, our Rest, our Shield, Our Rock, our Food, our Light; Each thought of Thee doth constant yield Unchanging, fresh delight.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Blest Savior, keep our spirit stayed, Hard following after Thee, Till we, in victory displayed, Thy face in glory see.
